lead_paragraph: Former British Prime Minister Gordon Brown is stepping up his efforts to stop Scotland leaving the United Kingdom as opinion polls show growing support for independence.

headline.main: Former British PM Brown Steps Up Bid to Keep Scotland in UK
headline.print_headline: Former British PM Brown Steps Up Bid to Keep Scotland in UK

snippet: Former British Prime Minister Gordon Brown is stepping up his efforts to stop Scotland leaving the United Kingdom as opinion polls show growing support for independence....
